levels.description:
Passive Effect: Attack Range increases
Activation Effect: throws Alchemical Units at the <@ba.vup>{max_target_token}</> Operators with the lowest Block; for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</>s, enemies within the defined area have ATK <@ba.vup>-{-atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>-{-def:0%}</>, RES <@ba.vup>-{-magic_resistance:0%}</> (does not stack); enemies also take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage per second; these effects gradually increase (reaching max values after <@ba.vup>{max_stack_cnt}</>s: ATK <@ba.vup>-{-max_atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>-{-max_def:0%}</>, RES <@ba.vup>-{-max_magic_resistance:0%}</>, take <@ba.vup>{max_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage per second)
